info.name: t-cumulated min or max w. relax
info.description:
cumulated min (left) and max (right) with relaxation.
Mouse.x pans the limit.

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 U )
{
    O =    T0(U-U).a != R.x                // frame 0 or resize
        || textureSize(iChannel1,0).x < 2  // texture not loaded yet
        ? vec4(.5)  
        : U.x/R.x < ( iMouse.z <= 0. ? .5 : iMouse.x/R.x )
#if 0
            ? min( T0(U)*1.01, T1(U) )
            : max( T0(U)/1.01, T1(U) );
#else
            ? min( T0(U)+.005, T1(U) )
            : max( T0(U)-.005, T1(U) );
#endif
    
    if (U==vec2(.5)) O.a = R.x;            // resize ref
}
renderpass.name: Buffer A

renderpass.code:
#define R iResolution.xy
#define T0(U) texture(iChannel0, (U)/R)
#define T1(U) texture(iChannel1, (U)/R)
renderpass.name: Common
